articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: 統計学や機械学習の勉強メモ, RのTipsを紹介するBlogになります。
articles.contents:
はい、ドーン!!!!!!

うちのぬこごめんなさい、ただうちのぬこを紹介したかっただけです。。。
改めてこのブログについてですが、tikeda-caravanの勉強したことやRのTips等を残していくことをメインしたブログになります。。。

articles.title: Tips
articles.contents:
find / -name brave 2>/dev/null



library(tidyverse)
knitr::include_url("bookmarks_2021_11_21.html", height = "10000px")






bookmark <- rvest::read_html("bookmarks_2021_11_21.html") %>%
  rvest::html_nodes("dt")

bookmark %>% purrr::map(print)

bookmark_df <- dplyr::tibble(
  # h3 = rvest::html_text(bookmark),
  h3 = rvest::html_node(bookmark, "h3") %>% rvest::html_text(),
  text = rvest::html_node(bookmark, "a") %>% rvest::html_text(bookmark),
  href = rvest::html_node(bookmark, "a") %>% rvest::html_attr("href")
) %>% 
  print
  dplyr::mutate(text = list()) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate())

library(rvest)
bookmark %>% html_node("a")

bookmark_df

a <- rvest::read_html("bookmarks_2021_11_21.html") %>% 
  rvest::html_children() %>% 
  rvest::html_children() %>% 
  rvest::html_children() %>% 
  print
  

hoge <- dplyr::tibble(hoge = list(rvest::read_html("bookmarks_2021_11_21.html"))) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(jimi = purrr::map_chr(hoge, ~rvest::html_node(.x, "h1") %>% rvest::html_text())) %>% 
  print
